title: Milfs vs. Zombies (2015 - USA) gore horror
description:
Milfs vs. Zombies (2015 - USA)

Comedy / Horror
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3609458/


Fuzzy Monkey Films Production

Taglines: It's not a porno!

The film follows a group of milfs, or housewives for you feminist types, as they spend a night at home drinking some wine and talking dick while their husbands are out doing guy things and their kids are camping. Unbeknownst to them, their husbands are hitting up a local whore house where no sex act is too perverse. Sadly, both parties get cut short when the arrival of the Undead breaks them up.

The story is another zombie outbreak but this one is full of sex, humour, and characters that could be straight out of a Troma flick. The acting is hard to criticize, we get some characters that are campy and cheesy while others are just there purely for eye candy. The film is full of gore, bloody boobs, and the Undead. The gore looks great and the practical effects are top notch. The kills are nothing new but they throw just enough gore and sex appeal into it that the viewer can't look away. Overall, Milfs vs. Zombies is frigging fun and hell, if you don't shower after you watch this film then you clearly did not pay attention.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 720x368, 23.976 fps, 1807 Kbps, 01h45m00s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
